Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.optimization

Class BinarySearchOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.optimization.BinarySearchOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptimizer, java.io.Serializable

    public class BinarySearchOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOptimizer, java.io.Serializable
    We optimize a single parameter using a binary search. If the new result is not better we keep the original parameter values.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
